blog.name: crowleys-bentley
blog.title: To The World. ✨
blog.description:
• I will never shut up about Good Omens. •

|| Gabz, 21, angsty filmmaker. ||

~

Likes, comments, & follows from my main: @angstystoryteller

summary: Highlights and what I learned from the advanced screening last night (spoiler-free):
body:
Highlights and what I learned from the advanced screening last night (spoiler-free):

  • I can confirm that GO is the limited series of the year.
  • The casting, acting, direction, cinematography, VFX, and writing are flawless.
  • The MUSIC is just too good.
  • David and Michael really did THAT.
  • Their screen chemistry is undeniable.
  • The atmosphere and space of Hell is absolutely amazing.
  • Aziraphale + food is a match made in heaven.
  • The show should always be seen on a gigantic screen with an invested audience.
  • Neilman is legitimately naturally funny when he speaks.
  • Neilman is the softest man. He talked about how books saved him and how he learned about life from them growing up.
  • He also talked about books being a safe place for people to discover themselves and learn how to traverse life.
  • He gave some advice about stories and writing and how you should sell the way a story is told, not the story itself.
  • Another interesting thing he talked about was the construction of the baby swap scene and what he learned about making it work.
  • May 31st can’t come soon enough.

tags: now I just have to take my anxiety meds to get over what have I done :D
title: YESSS
body:
After hearing that both David Tennant and Michael Sheen are going to be there In Conversation with @neil-gaiman and about the event the day before and about the bookshop, I was like… feeling that I really need to be there for all so I started googling flights and hotels and… I certainly can’t afford to stay in London for those day, hey London, why are you so damn expensive?! 

Buuuut, I found out some cheap flights, so I will flight to London 29, go to see our boys, probably go the airport and sleep there, and fly home in the morning! :)

I’m sorry I won’t get to see the nuns and the bookshop and escape from the Hell Escape Game, but still, it’s going to be pretty… ineffable ;)

(anyone want to do the same and wait with me at the airport at night? :D)

tags: even though we now know they were miserable during it
does this mean david was trying to save michael's sanity during the photoshoot?
in the same way crowley & aziraphale save each other throughout history?
summary: David Tennant and Michael Sheen - photographed for High Life Magazine (promotion for Good Omens) Excerpt from David Tennant Does...
caption:
David Tennant and Michael Sheen - photographed for High Life Magazine
(promotion for Good Omens)

Excerpt from David Tennant Does a Podcast With Michael Sheen:

David: We have just come from a publicity photoshoot for Good Omens, which is a show we’re doing, during which we had to sort of dress up in clothes and have our photograph taken, kind of as ourselves.

Michael:  Yeah

David: I don’t think I’m talking out of school when I say that both of us find that… not our favorite part of the job of acting.

Michael:  No. We haven’t talked about this until now, so this is quite fun. [David laughs]  Can I ask you, am I the grumpiest person you’ve ever seen at a photoshoot, or have you seen grumpier people?

David: Oh no, I’ve seen grumpier

Michael: You have?

David: Yeah.  I don’t think you’re that grumpy. I think you’re an honest version of how I’m feeling

Michael: I wanted to kill everyone. Including myself

David: [Laughing]  That’s exactly what’s going on in my head, but because I could see how annoyed you were at times, it made me become sort of a performing monkey, going “No, everything’s great! Everything’s fine!”

Michael: I’m so sorry

David:  No!  Because you’re right!  It was excruciating

Michael:  I was aware at certain moments that I was totally leaving you to pick up the pieces. [David laughs]  I was just refusing to answer certain things. I was like a child, just not answering.  And you were very nicely, because you’re a lovely person, saying something just so that there wasn’t utter silence.

David: Usually I’m you in that situation

Michael: [Laughing] Are you really?

David: Exactly. That’s what I mean. I think we’re very similar about it. I’m asking you, as a means of therapy for myself, why is that bit of the job so excruciating?

Michael: Because it sort of strips away a lot of the stuff that allows us to feel better about ourselves. 

David:  Right

Michael: So it strips away all the pretense of artistry.  It’s just, “MONKEY F**KING PERFORM, MONKEY!!!”

(promotion for Good Omens)

summary: I literally just made a post about how you can see David Tennant's dick through his trousers and the next post, which was...
body: I literally just made a post about how you can see David Tennant’s dick through his trousers and the next post, which was completely innocent, was flagged. So DT’s bulge is fine but Michael Sheen yawning (I think that’s what he was doing?) isn’t? What the heck Tumblr? 😂
